properties.sfomuseum:description: Handwritten letter from Harold M. Bixby to his wife, Debby Bixby, dated July 13, [1933], on stationery from the Metropole Hotel in Shanghai; includes family matters; mentions Bill [William] Grooch and Max Polin.
properties.wof:name: correspondence: Harold M. Bixby to Debby Bixby
